ygData.subject: Re: Make research fun
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I always here about the massive spell selection in Erudin.  Would it be possible for someone to travel there, and document the available spells.  I would
ygData.messageBody:
Jay Hollums wrote:

> From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
> Erudin Erudin Erudin.... click your heels together 3 times as well... and
> poof you wont be in Kansas any more...[look to the library]
>
> Rutreeii
> Cazic-Thul
>

I always here about the massive spell selection in Erudin. Would it be
possible for someone to travel there, and document the available spells. I
would myself, but I'm currently to far away from there. Also, I need the
wizard spells available in Neriak. The spell list is slowly getting updated,
but it will go a lot faster with some help :)

Cheers
Malkin
